name: UPS Pouch
description: A kevlar pouch created specifically to house a UPS. Wiring allows access to the UPS without removal.

name: Insulated 2.5L Canteen
description: A large plastic water canteen, with a 2.5 liter capacity and carrying strap. A bit of ductape and cellulose provide suprisingly effective insulation for the contents.

name: Insulated Canteen
description: A military-style water canteen with a 1.5 liter capacity.  Commonly worn at the hip. A bit of ductape and cellulose provide suprisingly effective insulation for the contents.
